verbose_text: Precocious loss of these factors in the SCMC (like NLRP5) could interfere with normal early embryogenesis, while alterations in the SCC-MSY2 domain and in chromatin remodeling factor BRG1 potentially disrupt proper epigenetic histone modifications (H4K12, H3K9 and H3K4 methylation) and spindle integrity.
evidence: BRG1 potentially disrupt proper epigenetic histone modifications (H4K12, H3K9 and H3K4 methylation
